analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The existing CSS file is incomplete and needs to be fully developed to include animations, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed with sections related to black holes, and the JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and completed for full functionality. The current theme is basic and needs enhancements to create a more immersive black hole experience.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
